arts.ttl: Player Ratings Poll: Bayern Munich 5 - 0 Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Bayern Munich exploded out of the gates against TSG Hoffenheim in the final match of the Bundesliga Hinrunde on Wednesday. This game had it all...positive performances all around.

arts.ttl: Vincent Kompany poo-poohs the discussion on Leroy Sané’s best position at Bayern Munich
arts.sum: In Bayern Munich ’s opening match of the year against Borussia Mönchengladbach, Leroy Sané played on the left side of the attack and had a poor game. In Bayern’s second match of the year, Sané played on the right side of the attack, scored two goals and had a great game.

arts.ttl: Daily Schmankerl: The aftermath of Bayern Munich vs. Hoffenheim; Decision on Alphonso Davies expected within two days; Arsenal wants Juventus striker Dušan Vlahović; Lionel Messi headed back to FC Barcelona?; and MORE!
arts.sum: Bayern Munich hosted Hoffenheim in a Bundesliga tie that was a must-win match given Bayer Leverkusen’s surge up the table. Bayern Munich was excellent from start to finish against a Hoffenheim squad that looked like it wanted to be anywhere else but at the Allianz Arena.

arts.ttl: “It was simply his moment,” Bayern Munich’s Vincent Kompany denies ulterior motives to Mathys Tel’s half time sub
arts.sum: From earning his minutes by training well to his performance, Mathys Tel showed that he wants to succeed at Bayern. When Bayern Munich returned for the second half for the club’s game against TSG Hoffenheim, it was somewhat surprising to see Mathys Tel taking the spot of Kingsley Coman.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich’s Thomas Müller emphasizes squad depth’s importance for busy January
arts.sum: Müller mentioned the entire squad is important and he backed those words with his performance today, as Bayern decidedly did not miss star Jamal Musiala. Unfortunately, Bayern Munich legend Thomas Müller tends to not start two games in a row often anymore.

arts.ttl: Match Awards from Bayern Munich’s 5-0 win over TSG Hoffenheim
arts.sum: While it is difficult to award the attack without any goals, it was Geiger who made the best efforts. While it was a disaster for the visitors, Bayern have continued a great run of form towards the business end of the season.

arts.ttl: Bavarian Podcast Works: Postgame Show — Bayern Munich 5-0 Hoffenheim (Bundesliga)
arts.sum: Bayern Munich were not very hospitable to visiting Hoffenheim. The Bavarians came out on fire, racked up two early goals and cruised to a 5-0 victory over a Hoffenheim side that is completely off the rails.

arts.ttl: “Every single player in the team has to perform, myself included” — Leroy Sané reiterates his desire to remain at Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Early in Bayern Munich ’s clash against TSG Hoffenheim in the Bundesliga, Harry Kane squared a simple pass across the box to gift a glorious opportunity to Leroy Sané. Every single player in the team has to perform, myself included,” Sané said, via @iMiaSanMia .

arts.ttl: Bajung Darboe: Who is the American youth international joining Bayern Munich?
arts.sum: Bajung Darboe has officially joined the Bayern Munich reserves from LAFC. "I'm comfortable in several positions in attack, so I'm versatile," Darboe explained after joining Bayern.

arts.ttl: Breaking: FC Bayern Munich set to sign TSG Hoffenheim’s Tom Bischof
arts.sum: The young German midfielder is one of the league’s brightest players already at the age of 19, and after quite a few weeks of intense rumours, it’s now confirmed that Bischof will be joining Bayern at the end of his contract in the summer on a free transfer, and it’s been made clear that Bischof is not going to be loaned out once he is signed, signalling that he will immediately become a part of the midfield unit. EXCLUSIVE | Tom #Bischof will join FC Bayern!
